product_description: Seamless pockets keep your hands cozy in this wool-kissed cardigan with an open-front design perfect for tossing on while dashing out the door.
product_details_and_care:
Seamless pockets keep your hands cozy in this wool-kissed cardigan with an open-front design perfect for tossing on while dashing out the door.
30" length (size Medium)
Open front
Front pockets
Ribbed cuffs and hem
78% acrylic, 14% nylon, 5% wool, 3% spandex
Machine wash, dry flat
Imported
Item #6012400
product_size_info:
Runs large; order one size down.
XS=0-2, S=4-6, M=8-10, L=12-14, XL=16 (14W), XXL=18 (16W).
